N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1850.4 - Advance payment of legal fees

State Regulations

In all proceedings for the advance
payment of legal fees to an attorney-fiduciary, instituted pursuant to the
provisions of SCPA ยง 2111, the petitioner shall file with his (her)
application, acknowledged consents to the relief requested signed by all those
persons whose interests in the estate would be affected by the proceeding, or, alternatively, shall cause citation to issue to such persons. Notes
